sub_title: AIIC Conference Interpreter, medical background ★ Russian - English and Russian - Greek
summary:
When you organise a meeting with several languages, it does not need to be stressful. I will help you to identify your language needs, bring together and manage a team of interpreters.

If you would like to discuss:

➢ which type of interpretation (simultaneous, consecutive or whispering) would be the best for your event,
➢ how to make the most of your language resources,
➢ or if you want help in assessing your language needs,

contact me on LinkedIn or via zouchra.kasimova@gmail.com

I genuinely believe that if you use interpreting at your international meeting, then you are:

★ Building trust and credibility
★ Engaging in better conversations
★ Making your counter-partners feel grateful to you.

I have interpreted at over eight hundred international conferences and meetings worldwide, helping people to communicate when they do not share a common language. My working languages are Russian, English and Greek, and my job is to make sure that your message gets across to the international audience.

Specialties:
• Medical conferences & translations, including clinical trials
• Law & Arbitration hearings
• Banking & Finance
• EU affairs
• International organisations
• Energy
• Christianity

As I have studied medicine, my true passion is medical conferences.
I believe this is where I stand out and make a true difference by tapping into my medical knowledge and expertise. It also benefits greatly my medical translations.

By applying my transferrable skills I interpret at international events across the globe for:

• International organisations
• Banks
• Financial institutions
• Government agencies
• Businesses
• Human rights defenders
• Sports federations
• Private clients

As a highly experienced simultaneous interpreter and translator I can help you grow your business and build up genuine connections with your partners from abroad.

Competences: multilingual events, international conference interpreting, medical translations, investigators' meetings

profile_positions.description:
International conference interpreter with medical background and experienced in banking, legal interpreting and energy

Languages: Russian, English and Greek
Simultaneous and consecutive interpreting

Credentials:
•	member of the International Association of Conference Interpreters (AIIC)
•	accredited with the Directorate General for Interpretation of the European Commission (SCIC)

Working for international organisations and private businesses.
Providing interpretation services at summits, conferences, workshops, during official visits and bilateral meetings all over the world.

Areas of expertise:

Medicine
Core strength: 4 years of medical training at Saint Petersburg Medical Academy, Russia
Clients:
European Center for Disease Prevention and Control
World Health Organisation

Simultaneous interpreting at:
-	Medical conferences  organised by medical associations on cardiology, rheumatology, pain management and orthopedics, asthma, diabetes and others, 
-	 Investigators’ meetings, clinical trial conferences and medical webinars run by pharmaceutical companies Boehringer Ingelheim, GSK, Novo Nordisk, Roche and TEVA among others.

Legal interpreting
Arbitration hearings at the International Dispute Resolution Center, London
European Public Law Center

Clients include European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
